title: News: Metronomy give remixing Lady GaGa a go
body:
Following my piece last week about [Lady GaGa being remixed by the Wild Beasts](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10502-news-lady-gagas-you-and-i-remixed-by-wild-beasts/ "lady gaga wild beasts remix"), Devonshire electro pop outfit, Metronomy have given remixed Yoü And I.

_(via [Youtube](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p6nCEqnjQfY&feature=youtu.be))_

This is far from the first remix that Metronomy front man, Joseph Mount, has dabbled with. His past interpretations include remixes of DNTEL, Gorillaz, CSS & [Architecture in Helsinki.](http://www.iguessimfloating.net/2009/07/mp3-architecture-in-helsinki-metronomy.html "AIH remix Metronomy via I guess im floating")

**See what you think and post your opinion in the comments below.**
